title.narrative: Second Chittagong Hill Tracts Rural Development Project

description.narrative: The Project impact will be increased rural household incomes in CHT subproject areas. The outcome of the Project will be increased employment and income generating opportunities in subproject areas. There will be five main outputs: (i) institutional development and capacity building; (ii) rural roads and markets; and (iii) community infrastructure; (iv) micro agribusiness development (MAD); and (v) project management.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Increased income-generating opportunities for men and women in subproject areas

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
50% of market space to be developed under the project allocated for women

description.narrative: Increased income-generating opportunities for men and women in subproject areas

title.narrative: Average time taken for women to fetch water is reduced from 1.5 hours 30 minutes

description.narrative: Increased income-generating opportunities for men and women in subproject areas

title.narrative: Increased number of crops marketed from 2 to 10 in areas unconnected in 2010

description.narrative: Increased income-generating opportunities for men and women in subproject areas

title.narrative: Increased HH commercial agricultural production from Tk20,000 per year in 2010 to Tk40,000 per year at 2010 price level

title.narrative: Reduced travel time to markets for women by on average 1 hour (2010 baseline = 4 hours)
